alert.note: Alert for Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Smith, west central Harrison, northwestern Rusk, southern Wood, western Upshur and Gregg Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 643 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gilmer to 6 miles northwest of Edom. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tyler, Longview, Kilgore, Whitehouse, White Oak, Gladewater, Gilmer, Mineola, Lindale, Overton, Big Sandy, Hawkins, Clarksville City, East Mountain, Hainesville, Rosewood, Hoard, Liberty City, West Mountain and Lake Palestine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
